test_cases.title: Successful login with valid credentials
test_cases.gherkin: Scenario: Successful login with valid credentials Given a registered user When the user enters valid credentials Then the user should be redirected to /secure and see a success banner

steps.value: You logged into a secure area!

test_cases.title: Unsuccessful login with invalid credentials
test_cases.gherkin: Scenario: Unsuccessful login with invalid credentials Given a registered user When the user enters invalid credentials Then the user should see an error message without redirect

steps.value: Username and password do not match

expected_results: User remains on the login page

test_cases.title: Validation error for empty fields
test_cases.gherkin: Scenario: Validation error for empty fields Given a registered user When the user submits the form without entering credentials Then the user should see validation errors
expected_results: Validation error for empty username is displayed
User remains on the login page
